taskSetItem.script1: var e0 = ee.getText(ee.getControl("layoutxitem23")); //ID var e1 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit9")); //用户昵称 var e2 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit10")); //用户手机 var e3 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit11")); //身份证姓名 var e4 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit12")); //金额 var e5 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit13")); //赠送金额 var e6 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit14")); //地址 var e7 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit15")); //用户类型 var e8 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit16")); //认证状态 var e15 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit3")); //审核状态 var e9 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit17")); //车牌号码 var e10 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit18")); //汽车型号 var e11 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit19")); //初次领证年份 var e14 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit2")); //身份证号码 var e12 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit4")); //驾照号码 var e13 = ee.getEditText(ee.getControl("edit5")); //陪练区域 //alert(e12); //alert(e14); //发送 eio.appendInt32(e0); //ID eio.appendString16(e1); //用户昵称 eio.appendString16(e2); //用户手机 eio.appendString16(e3); //身份证姓名 eio.appendInt32(e4); //金额 eio.appendInt32(e5); //赠送金额 eio.appendString16(e6); //地址 eio.appendString16(e7); //用户类型 eio.appendString16(e8); //认证状态 eio.appendString16(e15); //审核状态 eio.appendString16(e9); //车牌号码 eio.appendString16(e10); //汽车型号 eio.appendInt32(e11); //初次领证年份 eio.appendString16(e14); //身份证号码 eio.appendString16(e12); //驾照号码 eio.appendString16(e13); //陪练区域 //alert("111111111");
